description:
Speaker: Miroslav Šedivý

Track:PyData
About people with first names, middle names, last names, one-word names, multiple names, and changing names, about names with characters beyond ASCII, and about using Python to handle them correctly, because names of people cannot be invalid.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference.
https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/ZNA8WN
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pydataberlin
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pyconde
title: Your Name is Invalid!
